SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Bazaar relative to Starfall Mart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starfall Mart}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total price index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Bazaar}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Price Index go below 329.36 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1983, did the total Price Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1981 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total price index between 1981 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1981 and 1982.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1981 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total price index in 1981 was {lower} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Price Index in 1982 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total price index in 1982 was {lower} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1983, was the average total Price Index higher or lower than between 1982 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total price index between 1981 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1982 and 1983.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Starfall Mart} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Starfall Mart, Crimson Bazaar}.
